adminSections.config: This plugin is intended to be used by those implementing Adobe DTM on the site.  Please be aware to test on all pages before deploying to production.
adminSections.dataLayer: Use the meta data available within WordPress to easily build a data layer that you can use with DTM.  Check an item to add it to the data layer.  You can also configure the name of the item in the data layer.
adminSections.disable: Disable DTM from loading for anyone logged in or not logged in.  A great feature for disabling tracking for employees, or disabling tracking for guests while the implementation is underway.

config.name: dtm-code
config.label: DTM Embed Code
config.desc:
Enter only the src of your embed code here. Here is an example of the highlighted section of the code to copy:
<script type="text/javascript" src="//assets.adobedtm.com/5daf62d90488bcaa71c4fae1736a44b3b435fd84/satelliteLib-1b021de2daf1fe4a4d95e06b55a949cd0358e914.js"></script>

config.name: include-dtm-exists
config.label: DTM Already on Page
config.desc: DTM is already on the site, only add the data layer

config.name: dtm-datalayer-variable-name
config.label: Data Layer Variable Name
config.desc: Rename the data layer variable name.  Default is 'dataLayer'

dataLayer.label: Post Type
dataLayer.name: posttype
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the type of the post or archive page (post, page or any custom post type).

dataLayer.label: Post Sub Type
dataLayer.name: postsubtype
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the sub type of the post or archive page (post, page or any custom post type).

dataLayer.label: Page ID
dataLayer.name: pageid
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the page/post ID.

dataLayer.label: Category List
dataLayer.name: categories
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the category names of the post or archive page.

dataLayer.label: Tags
dataLayer.name: tags
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the tags of the post/page.

dataLayer.label: Author Name
dataLayer.name: author
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the author"s name of the post/page.

dataLayer.label: Post Date
dataLayer.name: postdate
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the date of the post. This will be an object with 4 sub objects: date, year, month, and day.

dataLayer.label: Post Title
dataLayer.name: posttitle
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the meta title of the post/page.

dataLayer.label: Post Custom Fields
dataLayer.name: custom
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the custom fields of the post/page.

dataLayer.label: Post Count
dataLayer.name: postcount
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the count of the posts currently shown on the page.

dataLayer.label: Search Term
dataLayer.name: searchterm
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the search term on the search results page.

dataLayer.label: Search Results
dataLayer.name: searchresults
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the number of search results on the search results page.

dataLayer.label: Search Origin
dataLayer.name: searchorigin
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the search origin on the search results page.

dataLayer.label: Logged-in Status
dataLayer.name: loggedin
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include whether there is a logged in user on your website.

dataLayer.label: Logged-in User Role
dataLayer.name: userrole
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include the role of the logged in user.

dataLayer.label: Comments
dataLayer.name: comments
dataLayer.desc: Check this option to include if a post has comments along with the # of comments.
